HELP.TITLE: How does Proxly work?
HELP.STEP1_DESC: Tap on the map or search for an address to mark where you want to be notified.
HELP.STEP2_DESC: Set the alert distance using the slider. Proxly will notify you when you enter that zone.
HELP.STEP3_DESC: Make sure the alert toggle is enabled to receive background notifications.
HELP.STEP4_DESC: Proxly works in the background. It will wake you with notification, vibration and sound when you arrive.
HELP.TIP1: Keep the app running in the background for it to work properly
HELP.TIP2: Adjust radius based on transport: larger for car, smaller for walking
HELP.TIP3: Make sure you have location and notification permissions enabled
